title: How to Play a Match of Control in Destiny

steps.headline: Set a course for the Crucible, and select Control.
Wait a minute or two.
steps.description: The system will have to evaluate you and your fellow Guardians to decide how to split you. Once your team is decided, you will launch.

steps.headline: Once you arrive at the map, prepare to play.
steps.description: The player on your team with the highest Crucible Reputation will act as the team Alpha.

steps.headline: Run to an empty zone.
steps.description: Choose from A, B, or C (preferably the ones closest to where you start).

steps.headline: Stay inside the zone until you and your teammates have captured it.
Defend your zones, or attack the enemy.
steps.description: Stay in an enemy zone until it is neutralized. After it is released from the enemies' grasp, you may capture it.

steps.headline: Play and duel until the time limit is reached.
steps.description: The team that has controlled the zones the most is the winner.

text: Set a course for the Crucible, and select Control. Press and hold 'Y/Triangle' to launch. Wait a minute or two. The system will have to evaluate you and your fellow Guardians to decide how to split you. Once your team is decided, you will launch. Once you arrive at the map, prepare to play. The player on your team with the highest Crucible Reputation will act as the team Alpha. Run to an empty zone. Choose from A, B, or C (preferably the ones closest to where you start). Stay inside the zone until you and your teammates have captured it.  Defend your zones, or attack the enemy. Stay in an enemy zone until it is neutralized. After it is released from the enemies' grasp, you may capture it. Play and duel until the time limit is reached. The team that has controlled the zones the most is the winner.
